description: Defines the Room database class 'NotesDatabase' for storing 'Note' entities and provides a singleton access method 'getDatabase' for obtaining the database instance within an Android app.

classes.name: NotesDatabase
classes.description: An abstract class extending RoomDatabase that provides access to DAO for Note entities and manages singleton instance.

methods.name: noteDao
methods.description: Abstract method to get the DAO interface for Note data operations.

methods.name: getDatabase
methods.description: Companion object method to retrieve a singleton instance of NotesDatabase, creating it if necessary.
